title: Mouse and key bored stop responding for 3-5 seconds in game
body: Sorry, don't know if this is the right section or anything but I just can't find anything online, this just started today, while I'm in game my keybored and mouse freeze and stop responding for a few seconds, it makes it quite hard to farm and fight, I have a Razer deathadder 2013 and a blackwidow ultimate 2013, I'm not sure whats going on because it only happens in league and outside of being in a match. if its already been solved please link me. couldn't find anything online

replies.body:
When you mean stop responding do you mean their lights turn off and it appears they lose power, or rather you're still able to move your mouse around in-game and your keyboard is still on, but the game or your character isn't responding to the input?

A little clarification can help me understand what's going on.
This started happening to me last night also and I have different hardware so it has to be somethinng in the game.

Well, there are many possibilities. Have you reset your computer recently? Have you tried unplugging/disconnecting both the keyboard and mouse and then reconnecting them? Are they running low on batteries? You might also want to try repairing your client; I had keyboard issues for quite a long time and I fixed it by repairing my client.
what do you mean repair my client?

When you initially open your client, there should be a gear icon in the corner of your client. Click on it, and there should be a tab titled: "Initiate full repair." Click on it, and your client will be "repaired", and any possible corrupted files will be overwritten with fresh new files. However, this is almost like installing the game from scratch, so it might take a while to complete. However, if you believe this is going to solve this issue, you should try it out.
